cont.entity_a: Heats a garage effectively from 26 to 78 degrees with two units in 24-degree weather. Heats well but uses a lot of electricity. Suitable for heating large and insulated spaces. Heats quickly and maintains comfortable temperatures.
cont.entity_b: Heats up small spaces like bathrooms quickly and quietly. Quiet and effective for small spaces like bedrooms or bathrooms.

cont.entity_a: Internal thermostat can be overridden for manual control. Fan does not operate until the space reaches 55 degrees. Temperature control is difficult to regulate. Inconsistent temperature control and noisy fan issues reported. Connected to a thermostat, it uses 5000 watts when on.
cont.entity_b: Thermostat activates even when off, causing unnecessary heating. Lacks temperature control; fan is not strong. No thermostat included despite packaging claims. Thermostat may wear out quickly, causing continuous operation.

cont.entity_a: Installation requires hardwiring, not plug-in. Mounting bar is flimsy when wall-mounted. Easy installation with power consumption adjustments.
cont.entity_b: Requires a knockout clamp not included. Installation recommended by an electrician with wall thermostat. Arrived on time and easy to install.

cont.entity_a: Defective units reported with poor manufacturer support. Concerns about product quality and durability. Some units fail after one year. Units may arrive damaged due to poor packaging.
cont.entity_b: Long-lasting with no issues over many years.
